title: Run — Endurance 45′ (Z2)
description: Steady aerobic run to build aerobic base and durability.

title: Run — Threshold 3×10′ (Z4)
description: Sustained LT2 work to raise threshold pace; short recoveries.

title: Run — Taper Sharpener 30′ + 6×1′ Strides (Z2)
description: Keep legs snappy without fatigue; taper-safe opener.

title: Bike — Endurance 90′ + Tempo Blocks (Z2)
description: Aerobic endurance with light tempo exposures for muscular endurance.

title: Bike — Threshold 3×12′ (Z4)
description: Raise sustainable power with long LT2 intervals.

title: Bike — Taper Opener 50′ (Z2)
description: Maintain intensity feel without accumulating fatigue.

title: Swim — Taper Sharpener 30′ (6×1′ Fast) (Z2)
description: Keep feel for the water; short fast reps with plenty of easy.

title: Swim — CSS 10×2′ (Z4)
description: Threshold/CSS reps to improve sustainable swim pace.

title: Strength — Full-Body 45′ (Strength)
description: General strength: hinge, squat, push, pull and trunk; RPE 6–7.

title: Strength — Run-Support 30′ (Strength)
description: Calf complex, hamstrings, hip stabilisers; low volume to avoid soreness.

segments.notes: Calf raises 3×10, RDL 2×8 light, hip abduction 2×12, plank 3×30–45s @ RPE 5–6

title: Run — Endurance 60′ (Z2)
description: Moderate aerobic run; builds endurance volume progressively.

title: Run — Endurance 75′ (Z2)
description: Long aerobic run for endurance capacity; builds weekly mileage.

title: Run — Endurance 90′ (Z2)
description: Weekly long run; cornerstone of aerobic development.

title: Run — Endurance 120′ (Z2)
description: Extended long run for race-specific endurance; builds fatigue resistance.

title: Run — Progression 60′ (Z2→Z3)
description: Gradual pace progression to teach pacing discipline and finish strong.

title: Run — Base with Strides 60′ (Z2)
description: Aerobic run with neuromuscular activation; maintains leg speed.

title: Run — Tempo 60′ (Z3)
description: Sustained tempo effort to build muscular endurance and lactate clearance.

title: Run — Threshold 4×8′ (Z4)
description: Classic threshold intervals to raise lactate threshold.

title: Run — VO2max 6×3′ (Z5)
description: High-intensity intervals to develop maximum aerobic capacity.

segments.notes: Z5 VO2max effort; hard but controlled

title: Run — Sweet Spot 3×10′ (Z3–Z4)
description: Sub-threshold intervals at 88–94% threshold HR to build sustainable pace.

title: Run — Fartlek 60′ (Z2–Z4)
description: Unstructured speed play; varied pace with surges to build adaptability.

segments.notes: Fartlek: alternate Z2/Z3/Z4; e.g., 3′ Z2, 2′ Z3, 1′ Z4, repeat

title: Run — Hill Repeats 8×90s (Z4–Z5)
description: Uphill strength-endurance to build power and running economy.

title: Swim — Technique 40′ (Z2)
description: Drill-focused session to refine stroke mechanics and efficiency.

segments.notes: Z2 continuous swim 500m focusing on technique

title: Swim — Negative Split 50′ (5×200) (Z3→Z4)
description: Second-half faster intervals to develop finishing speed and race tactics.

title: Swim — Sprint Prep 45′ (8×50) (Z5)
description: Short fast reps to sharpen speed and prepare for race intensity.

title: Swim — Taper Pre-Race 30′ (Z2)
description: Race-week swim to maintain feel without fatigue.

title: Swim — Recovery 30′ (Z1)
description: Active recovery swim; flush muscles and maintain technique.

segments.notes: Z1 very easy 1500m; focus on smooth strokes, no intensity

title: Swim — Drill Focus 35′ (Z1–Z2)
description: Technique refinement with low-intensity drill emphasis.

title: Strength — Lower Body 50′ (Strength)
description: Squat, deadlift, and single-leg work; builds running and cycling power.

segments.notes: Hip mobility, glute activation, leg swings
Back squat 4×6 @ RPE 7; RDL 3×8; Bulgarian split squat 3×8 each; calf raises 3×15

title: Strength — Upper Body + Core 45′ (Strength)
description: Push, pull, and core stability; supports swim power and posture.

segments.notes: Shoulder mobility, band pull-aparts, arm circles
Push-ups 3×12; pull-ups/rows 3×8; overhead press 3×10; core circuit 3 rounds @ RPE 6–7

title: Strength — Functional Movement 45′ (Strength)
description: Kettlebell swings, Turkish get-ups, carries; develops whole-body power.

segments.notes: KB swings 4×15; Turkish get-ups 3×3 each; farmer carries 4×40m; step-ups 3×10 each @ RPE 6–7

title: Strength — Mobility + Stability 35′ (Strength)
description: Hip mobility, T-spine rotation, single-leg balance; injury prevention focus.

segments.notes: Hip CARs 2×5; 90/90 stretches; T-spine rotations; single-leg balance 3×45s each; plank variations @ RPE 5–6

title: Strength — Power Development 55′ (Strength)
description: Explosive movements: box jumps, power cleans, medicine ball throws.

segments.notes: Dynamic warm-up with jumps and bounds
Box jumps 4×6; power cleans 4×5; med ball slams 4×8; jump squats 4×8 @ RPE 7–8

title: Strength — Hill Power 50′ (Strength)
description: Heavy squats, deadlifts, Bulgarian splits; builds cycling and running strength.

segments.notes: Heavy squats 4×6 @ RPE 8; deadlifts 4×5; Bulgarian split squats 3×8 each; box step-ups 3×10 each

title: Strength — Olympic Lift Focus 55′ (Strength)
description: Hang cleans, front squats, push press; explosive triple extension.

segments.notes: Hang cleans 5×5; front squats 4×6; push press 4×6; core power work @ RPE 7–8

title: Strength — Plyometric Circuit 45′ (Strength)
description: Depth jumps, bounding, single-leg hops; develops reactive strength.

segments.notes: Dynamic warm-up with skips and bounds
4 rounds: depth jumps 6 reps; bounding 20m; single-leg hops 8 each; med ball slams 10 @ RPE 7–8

title: Strength — Sprint Strength 50′ (Strength)
description: Heavy squats, RDLs, sled pushes; maximal strength for speed development.

segments.notes: Heavy squats 5×5 @ RPE 8–9; RDL 4×8; sled pushes 6×20m; single-leg deadlifts 3×8 each

title: Strength — Maintenance Full Body 35′ (Strength)
description: Reduced volume strength maintenance for race season; avoid excessive fatigue.

segments.notes: 2 sets: squats 2×8; push-ups 2×10; rows 2×10; core 2 rounds @ RPE 6–7

title: Strength — Quick Strength 25′ (Strength)
description: Time-efficient circuit for race season; minimal DOMS.

segments.notes: 2–3 rounds: bodyweight squats 15; push-ups 12; planks 45s; lunges 10 each @ RPE 6

title: Strength — Taper Core 25′ (Strength)
description: Low-volume core and stability work; taper-safe, no leg DOMS.

segments.notes: 2 sets: planks 3×30–45s; bird dogs 2×10 each; dead bugs 2×10 each; pallof press 2×10 each @ RPE 5

title: Strength — Taper Activation 20′ (Strength)
description: Neuromuscular activation without fatigue; race-week primer.

segments.notes: 1 set: bodyweight squats 10; band pull-aparts 15; glute bridges 15; planks 30s @ RPE 4–5

title: Strength — Hip + Glute Activation 35′ (Strength)
description: Clamshells, hip bridges, monster walks; prevents IT band and knee issues.

segments.notes: Clamshells 3×15 each; hip bridges 3×15; monster walks 3×20; single-leg balance 3×45s each; IT band work @ RPE 4–5

title: Strength — Runner Prevention 35′ (Strength)
description: Calf strengthening, foot intrinsics, hip flexor work; addresses common weak points.

segments.notes: Calf raises 3×15; toe curls 2×20; hip flexor stretches; core anti-rotation 3×10 each @ RPE 4–5

title: Swim — Endurance 50′ (2500m) (Z2)
description: Continuous aerobic swim to build endurance and stroke efficiency.

segments.notes: Z2 continuous 2000m; focus on rhythm and breathing

title: Swim — CSS Baseline 40′ (10×100) (Z3)
description: Critical swim speed baseline set to establish threshold pace.

title: Swim — Pull + Kick 45′ (Z2)
description: Isolated work to build upper body strength and leg power.

title: Swim — Endurance 60′ (3000m) (Z2)
description: Extended continuous swim for aerobic capacity and mental endurance.

title: Swim — Threshold 5×300 (Z4)
description: Mid-distance threshold intervals to build sustainable pace.

title: Swim — Descending Ladder 55′ (Z3–Z4)
description: Descending intervals to develop pace judgment and speed endurance.

title: Swim — CSS Progression 50′ (10×150) (Z4)
description: Progressive CSS work at faster than race pace to build speed reserve.

title: Swim — Mixed Pace 60′ (12×100) (Z2/Z4)
description: Alternating easy and hard reps to develop pace control and recovery.

title: Swim — Threshold Extended 60′ (2×800) (Z4)
description: Long threshold reps to build race-distance stamina at pace.

title: Swim — VO2max 10×100 (Z5)
description: Short high-intensity reps to develop speed and anaerobic capacity.

title: Swim — Race Pace 4×400 (Z4)
description: Race-distance intervals at goal pace to build confidence and pacing.

title: Swim — Open Water Simulation 60′ (Z3–Z4)
description: Continuous swim with minimal rest to simulate open water race conditions.

segments.notes: Z3–Z4 continuous swim 2500m; minimal wall contact, practice sighting

segments.title: Run — Race Pace 3×15′ (Z4)
segments.description: Race-specific pace work to dial in goal pace and mental preparation.

segments.title: Run — Brick Off Bike 30′ (Z3–Z4)
segments.description: Transition simulation; run immediately after bike to practice T2 fatigue.

segments.notes: Z3–Z4; legs heavy initially, settle into rhythm

segments.title: Run — Negative Split 90′ (Z2→Z3–Z4)
segments.description: Long run with second half faster; builds race-day pacing discipline.

segments.notes: Z3–Z4 increase pace; second half faster

segments.title: Run — VO2max Short 10×90s (Z5)
segments.description: Short high-intensity reps to sharpen VO2max and speed.

segments.title: Run — Threshold Extended 60′ (Z4)
segments.description: Sustained threshold run for race-day confidence; builds stamina at pace.

segments.title: Run — Taper Pre-Race 20′ (Z2)
segments.description: Race-week shakeout; keep legs loose without fatigue.

segments.title: Run — Recovery 20′ (Z1)
segments.description: Active recovery; flush legs and promote adaptation without stress.

segments.notes: Z1 very easy; no pace goals, focus on form

segments.title: Run — Recovery 30′ (Z1)
segments.description: Extended recovery run; maintain aerobic stimulus with minimal stress.

segments.notes: Z1 easy; conversational pace, focus on smooth mechanics

segments.title: Bike — Endurance 60′ (Z2)
segments.description: Base aerobic ride; high cadence, low resistance.

segments.title: Bike — Endurance 120′ (Z2)
segments.description: Long endurance ride for aerobic capacity; steady effort.

segments.title: Bike — Endurance 150′ (Z2)
segments.description: Weekly long ride; cornerstone of cycling endurance development.

segments.title: Bike — Endurance 180′ (Z2)
segments.description: Extended long ride; builds race-specific endurance and mental toughness.

segments.notes: Z2 steady; manage nutrition and pacing

segments.title: Bike — Cadence Work 75′ (Z2)
segments.description: High-cadence drills to improve pedaling efficiency and leg speed.

segments.title: Bike — Spin-Ups 60′ (Z2)
segments.description: Short high-cadence bursts to develop neuromuscular coordination.

segments.title: Bike — Progression 90′ (Z2→Z3)
segments.description: Gradual build to tempo; teaches pacing and muscular endurance.

segments.title: Bike — Sweet Spot 90′ (Z3–Z4)
segments.description: Sub-threshold intervals at 88–94% FTP to maximize training efficiency.

segments.title: Bike — Threshold 2×20′ (Z4)
segments.description: Classic FTP builder; sustained power at lactate threshold.

segments.title: Bike — Over-Unders 3×12′ (Z4/Z5)
segments.description: Alternating threshold and VO2max to improve lactate clearance.

segments.title: Bike — VO2max 5×4′ (Z5)
segments.description: High-intensity intervals to develop maximum aerobic power.

segments.title: Bike — Tempo 90′ (Z3)
segments.description: Sustained tempo ride to build muscular endurance and sub-threshold power.

segments.title: Bike — 40/20 Intervals 3×8′ (Z5)
segments.description: Short high-intensity reps to develop anaerobic capacity and repeatability.

segments.title: Bike — Sweet Spot Long 2×25′ (Z3–Z4)
segments.description: Extended sweet spot intervals for race-day power endurance.

segments.notes: High Z3/low Z4 sweet spot; hold steady

segments.title: Bike — Race Pace 3×20′ (Z4)
segments.description: Race-specific power intervals to dial in goal wattage and pacing strategy.

segments.title: Bike — VO2max Short 8×2′ (Z5)
segments.description: Short high-power intervals to sharpen VO2max and race readiness.

segments.title: Bike — Threshold Extended 60′ (Z4)
segments.description: Sustained threshold effort for mental toughness and race simulation.

segments.title: Bike — Brick to Run 60′ (Z3–Z4)
segments.description: Transition practice; hold race power then dismount for run.

segments.notes: Z3–Z4 race effort; practice nutrition and T2 prep
Z2 ease off; prepare for run

segments.title: Bike — Race Simulation 120′ (Variable)
segments.description: Full race-distance effort with variable pacing to simulate race demands.

segments.notes: Variable Z3–Z4; simulate race terrain, wind, nutrition

segments.title: Bike — Taper Pre-Race 40′ (Z2)
segments.description: Race-week opener; short intensity touches to maintain sharpness.

segments.title: Bike — Recovery Spin 30′ (Z1)
segments.description: Active recovery; flush legs without stress.

segments.notes: Z1 very easy; high cadence, low resistance, no pace goals

segments.title: Bike — Recovery Spin 45′ (Z1)
segments.description: Extended recovery ride; smooth pedaling and aerobic maintenance.

segments.notes: Z1 easy; focus on smooth circles, relaxed upper body
